data.description: Reddit is a community of communities. It’s built on shared interests, passion, and trust, and is home to the most open and authentic conversations on the internet. Every day, Reddit users submit, vote, and comment on the topics they care most about. With 100,000+ active communities and approximately 116 million daily active unique visitors, Reddit is one of the internet’s largest sources of information. For more information, visit www.redditinc.com. The Internal Communications team at Reddit exists to build shared belief, deepen understanding, and strengthen the quality and speed of execution across our workforce. This team manages the flow of information across Reddit, cross-functionally unifying our strategy and creating signal in a global, high-growth company. We are eager to add an exceptional Internal Communications Senior Manager to our ranks. As an individual contributor reporting to the Head of Internal Communications, this individual will be a dedicated business partner to Reddit’s EVP of Advertising Sales and the Global Sales Organization (GSO). This role presents a unique opportunity to spearhead internal communications strategy and execution for one of the company’s largest and most dynamic business functions. This individual should multiply productivity for the Global Sales Organization, bringing Reddit’s Internal Communications pillars to life: Inspire: Build belief in Reddit’s mission, opportunity, and unique company culture Align: Deepen understanding of our strategy, goals, and priorities Improve: Strengthen quality and speed of execution against Reddit’s most critical opportunities This role is required to work from our New York City office three days a week. What You’ll Do Communications Strategy Development: Build a results-driven strategy and an engaging ecosystem of communications programs that positively impact the belief and behavior of GSO employees. Narrative Development: Translate strategic revenue priorities and performance data into engaging and actionable narratives that get etched into memory like viral jingles. Content Development: Develop compelling content formats to share go-to-market priorities, transformation initiatives, and executive communications. Event Design & Facilitation: Design and execute tentpole, organization-wide communication moments like All Hands meetings, AMAs, and more. Change Management: Develop airtight communications plans that result in effective change absorption, business continuity, and revenue growth Culture-Building: Amass and guide an internal network of influencers, thought leaders, and advocates to embed cultural ideals, proliferate continuous feedback, assess change absorption, and nurture multidirectional communication. Impact Measurement & Reporting: Define metrics to evaluate communication effectiveness, demonstrate impact, and enable continuous improvement. Cross-Functional Partnership: Collaborate with the Communications, HR, and Sales Strategy & Operations teams to ensure collective progress against cross-functional priorities. Brand Stewardship: Uphold excellence in clarity, tone, and brand voice across all touchpoints. What You’ll Bring 8+ years in internal or executive communications; technology or media industry preferred. Strong track record of advising and influencing C-level and VP-level leaders. Proven success partnering with Sales and revenue-generating teams. Experience partnering with global teams across time zones. Confidence operating with agency and pace in ambiguity. Exceptional writing, editing, and storytelling abilities. Proficiency in Google Workspace and Slack. High emotional intelligence, strong organizational intuition, and operational discipline. Bachelor's degree in Communications, Journalism, or a related field preferred, but not required. Characteristics for Success in This Role A Zero-to-One Builder: You transform big hypotheses and ideas into tangible initiatives and results. A One-to-Ten Scaler: You scale MVPs into wide-reaching programs and campaigns. A Line Leader: You’re not afraid to jump headfirst into ambiguity and get your hands messy. A Sprinter: You move quickly, internalizing that time is of the essence. An Influencer: You build strong, authentic relationships and influence without authority. A Diligent Listener: You’re adept at teasing out signal by asking strong questions. A Marksman: You’re focused and concise in your writing, elevating only the essential. A Storyteller: You develop and deploy modernized messaging that moves hearts, minds, and hands. A Dreamer: You often find yourself daydreaming, ideating, and asking “what if?” A Human: You break out in hives at the thought of corporate jargon or AI-generated slop. A Good Time: You have a collection of favorite memes/gifs and don’t take yourself too seriously. A Planner: You earmark important moments and skillfully plan backwards to prepare for day 0. Benefits Comprehensive Healthcare Benefits and Income Replacement Programs 401k with Employer Match Global Benefit programs that fit your lifestyle, from workspace to professional development to caregiving support Family Planning Support Gender-Affirming Care Mental Health & Coaching Benefits Flexible Vacation & Paid Volunteer Time Off Generous Paid Parental Leave Pay Transparency: This job posting may span more than one career level. In addition to base salary, this job is eligible to receive equity in the form of restricted stock units, and depending on the position offered, it may also be eligible to receive a commission. Additionally, Reddit offers a wide range of benefits to U.S.-based employees, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401(k) program with employer match, generous time off for vacation, and parental leave. To learn more, please visit https://www.redditinc.com/careers/. To provide greater transparency to candidates, we share base pay ranges for all US-based job postings regardless of state. We set standard base pay ranges for all roles based on function, level, and country location, benchmarked against similar stage growth companies. Final offer amounts are determined by multiple factors including, skills, depth of work experience and relevant licenses/credentials, and may vary from the amounts listed below.The base pay range for this position is:$180,200 - $252,300 USDIn select roles and locations, the interviews will be recorded, transcribed and summarized by artificial intelligence (AI). You will have the opportunity to opt out of recording, transcription and summarization prior to any scheduled interviews. During the interview, we will collect the following categories of personal information: Identifiers, Professional and Employment-Related Information, Sensory Information (audio/video recording), and any other categories of personal information you choose to share with us. We will use this information to evaluate your application for employment or an independent contractor role, as applicable. We will not sell your personal information or disclose it to any third party for their marketing purposes. We will delete any recording of your interview promptly after making a hiring decision. For more information about how we will handle your personal information, including our retention of it, please refer to our Candidate Privacy Policy for Potential Employees and Contractors. Reddit is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and is committed to building a workforce representative of the diverse communities we serve. Reddit is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities and disabled veterans in our job application procedures. If, due to a disability, you need an accommodation during the interview process, please let your recruiter know.
